title: Alien 05 - Game Assets + Extra
description: Alien 05 with full complete gigerian armor, gigerian armor divided into four modular pieces and a weapon!
longDescription:
A unique Alien for your game, designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror/Action game with full complete gigerian armor, gigerian armor divided into four modular pieces and a weapon!


Have you already purchased at least one Stigma Studios product on UE MarketPlace? Join on Discord and access to a Limited Promo - You can choose one Product for FREE
This is a limited promotion, if you have ever purchased even a single Stigma Studios product in the UE Marketplace, that will allow you to have one character of your choice for FREE! Once you have entered the Discord, check the #welcome channel and follow the instructions! This promo is not cumulative, is valid only once.
Request for custom character? Take a look Here


Do you want to save 20% on your entire second collection of Alien? Get Alien Bundle 02 Here!

Do you want to save 25% on your entire first and second collection of Alien? Get Alien Mega Bundle 01 Here!

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Full 3D Character: 3d model to get a unique design impact for your game.
  • Extra: full complete gigerian armor, gigerian armor divided into four modular pieces and a weapon!
  •  Versatile Design: Model designed to be used in different artistic contexts and be versatile.


Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

Animated: Yes ( ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to Alien 05)

Number of Main Characters: 1

Number of Skeletal Mesh - Armor: 5

Number of Static Mesh: 1

Vertex counts of Main Character: 16.220

Tris counts of Main Character: 27.036


Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096

Number of Animations: 8 (ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to Alien 05)
